name: Sniper Killer: Shooting Assass
description:
Sniper Killer: Shooting Assassin!!!
Pull the trigger and eliminate the terrorists from your territory. Kill all the evil forces in the region and spread your name in the area. Become the Elite Sniper Shooter of the town. Kill all the Contract Killers and get your self at top like a Boss. Become a Boss Sniper Contractor.
Features:
• Ultra-realistic sniper HD graphics and shooting slow motion shots
• Multiple thrilling killer games missions
• Huge range shooting gun and sniper games atmosphere
• Easy and smooth sniper controls
• Enjoy smooth dimension with gun games addictive environment
• Excellent 3D graphics and thrilling shooter features
